snippet: SHAPIRO--Blanche. Park East Synagogue mourns the death of Blanche Shapiro, a Woman of Valor, devoted member and benefactor, who with her late husband, Romie Shapiro, "Chatan Torah," exemplified a lifetime of dedication to Torah values, support of Jewish education and Israel. Heartfelt sympathy to the family and friends. Funeral services in the Sanctuary of a grateful Congregation Monday, March 21, 11am, 163 East 67 Street, New York. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3
